original_title: 仮面ライダーキバ キミもキバになろう
overview: Wataru Kurenai, Keisuke Nago, and Otoya Kurenai introduce themselves to a boy (the viewer) who has wandered into the Café mald'amour and offer to teach him how he can be like each of them. This DVD is referred to as an Adventure Battle DVD and it takes on the form of a Choose Your Own Adventure story.
title: Kamen Rider Kiva: You Can Be Kiva Too!
